Package org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.control.localization

Class Encoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.firstinspires.ftc.teamcode.control.localization.Encoder
  • public class Encoder
extends java.lang.Object
    Wraps a motor instance to provide corrected velocity counts and allow reversing without changing the corresponding slot's motor direction

      • setDirection

        public void setDirection​(Encoder.Direction direction)
        Allows you to set the direction of the counts and velocity without modifying the motor's direction state
        Parameters:
        direction - either reverse or forward depending on if encoder counts should be negated
